# flake8

Lightweight tool focused on PEP-8 style, basic errors, and code complexity.

```{python}
#| echo: false
# Import required packages
import subprocess
from tools_helpers import generate_html, print_quarto
```

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
generate_html(
    pypi_url="https://pypi.org/project/flake8/",
    github_url="https://github.com/pycqa/flake8",
    conda_url="https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/flake8"
)
```

Example quarto `.qmd` file:

:::{.pale-grey}
```{python}
#| echo: false
print_quarto("examples/flake8.qmd")
```
:::

Run flake8 using `lintquarto`:

```{.bash}
lintquarto flake8 file.qmd
```

```{python}
#| echo: false
result = subprocess.run(
    ["lintquarto", "flake8", "examples/flake8.qmd"],
    capture_output=True, text=True
)
print(result.stdout)
```
